byline.original: By PATRICK HEALY and AMY CHOZICK

abstract: Sen Bernie Sanders, in debate before coming New York primary, repeatedly attacks Hillary Clinton over her ties to Wall Street banks and wealthy donors, while she responds with steely confidence and jabs of her own; contentious give-and-take at Brooklyn Navy Yard centers on issues of judgment and influence.
lead_paragraph: Bernie Sanders repeatedly savaged Hillary Clinton’s ties to wealthy donors and Wall Street banks, while Mrs. Clinton countered with steely confidence.

headline.main: In Democratic Debate, Clinton and Sanders Spar Over Judgment
headline.print_headline: Democrats Set a Steely Tone in New York

snippet: Bernie Sanders repeatedly savaged Hillary Clinton’s ties to wealthy donors and Wall Street banks, while Mrs. Clinton countered with steely confidence.
